titles.title: Let There Be Love Shared Among Us

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let there be love shared among us.
Let there be love in our eyes!
May now Your love sweep this nation!
Cause us, oh Lord, to arise!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give us a fresh understanding
Of brotherly love that is real!
Let there be love shared among us!
Let there be love!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Que haya amor en nosotros.
Que haya amor en nuestros ojos.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Danos un nuevo entendimiento
De este amor corporal.
Que haya amor en nosotros, que haya amor.
